description:
The sky is blue, the guys are hot, so what's there to do? Have sex!

That's what Patrick Rouge and JonnyT were thinking anyway.

You've probably seen these two hunks playing with our other models, so it was only a matter of time until we hooked these two sex fiends up.

The scene begins with passionate kissing which quickly turns into naked horseplay, blowjobs, rim jobs and of course some ass fucking. Actually, so much ass fucking that Patrick Rouge gets off twice.

Enjoy!
title: Jonny T & Patrick Rouge
